name: LULD - Love up, love down
description:
Do you ever wonder why in games the lifebar in made up of hearts? And what is love?

Starring Rocco Billy and Jack Lumber

Complete both levels to get the ending and let me know what do you think about the game in comments. Thanks! 

CONTROLS:

LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS: move to left/right

SPACE BAR: action

CTRL: heart action
